packmat

PURPOSE

PACKMAT assumes a symmetric matrix on input and returns its 'L' packed

SYNOPSIS

function [Ap] = packmat(A)

DESCRIPTION 

 PACKMAT assumes a symmetric matrix on input and returns its 'L' packed 
 representation i.e., a dense vector of length n*(n+1)/2 set up
 by columns of the lower triangle of A
